name: Dragonkin: The Ancestral Blood
description:
Dragonkin: The Ancestral Blood was created as a bachelor senior's capstone project. We are a team of 13 called Senzo Studio and wanted to create a fun yet challenging game with a lot of combat and immersive gameplay. All members info  can be found down below! Please check us out!

SENZO STUDIO:

Brianna Houser - Creative Director & Character Artist
https://briannahouserportfolio.weebly.com/portfolio.html

Susanna Perez -  Producer & Environmental Artist
https://perezsana987.wixsite.com/website
https://sanana-p.itch.io/

Lisa Le - Art Lead & Tech Artist
https://itch.io/profile/mlightat
https://www.artstation.com/lisale713

Andrew Freitas - Programming Lead & Combat Programmer
https://www.linkedin.com/in/andrew-freitas-720b47179/

Jenna Ward -  Environmental Artist
https://www.artstation.com/jennaward
https://jcward00.itch.io/

Steven Ulloa - Systems & Game Programmer

Meaghan Archer - 3D Artist & Animator
https://www.artstation.com/archerr

Jamie LaRose - Level & Sound Designer
https://digitalmysticism.wixsite.com/jamielarose

Tristen Jordan - General Programmer & UI Designer

Kristijan Zecevic - 3D Designer

Ashley Leandres - Animator
https://www.artstation.com/ashleyleandres
https://ashleyleandres.itch.io/

J'rdan Thigpen - General & Combat Programmer
https://thigpenportfolio.wordpress.com/

David Linaburg - General & AI Programmer

Special thanks to all our playtesters and everyone at our workshop class! 

Fair Right Use and Permissions:

We utilized multiple free use &; royalty free assets within our game. 
Freesounds.org
BreakingCopyright - Royalty Free Music 
Youtube Studios Music Library
Squidward's Nose instrumental by Cupcakke 

Before download:

Thanks for downloading our game! Please make sure to read the "ReadMe" before playing if there is one readily available! This game is not compatible with Mac, Linux, or Android. 
Please utilize the forum attached to the ReadMe if you would like to leave a review and or report a bug!
